thread.title: Arctic report as dire as drought, fire, flood - Connecticut Post
thread.title_full: Arctic report as dire as drought, fire, flood - Connecticut Post - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Connecticut Post
title: Arctic report as dire as drought, fire, flood - Connecticut Post
text:
NASA caption: The 2015 Arctic sea ice summertime minimum is 699,000 square miles below the 1981-2010 average, shown here as a gold line. Credits: NASA/Goddard Scientific Visualization Studio Any year in which we have amassed the hottest, longest, deadliest natural calamities in generations, a report on the fourth lowest extent of minimum Arctic sea ice is pretty ho-hum.
 Connecticut Post.
